channel.title: "javac" is not recogized as an
channel.description:
internal or external command operale program or batch file press any key to continue..
Every time I open the compile I get this message above. I am using a PhoneScape source, and compiler. I would please want some one to help me through this. Sorry if you think this sounds "Newby."

item.title: "javac" is not recogized as an
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

Happened to me. You must not have extracted. Listen to what I say… go into your documents through winRAR and left click on your phonescape folder in winzip. Click extract to the specified folder. You’ll get a window that pops up. On the right hand side of that window are a bunch of folders. Click “desktop” at the very top so its highlighted and then click “ok” at the bottom of the screen. hope it helps

Read full topic

item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

Dude you either need JDK and JRE or if you open the compiler it may be looking in the wrong area, so try finding the actual path.
